headline: Car Plows Into Group of Tourists in Italy, Killing 6
abstract: The victims had used a shuttle service set up to prevent drunken driving, but prosecutors said they were hit by a man with blood-alcohol levels far over the limit.
lead_paragraph: ROME â€” A car plowed into a group of young German tourists as they crossed a road in northern Italy early on Sunday, killing six people and injuring 11 others, four seriously, Italian officials said.
